Properties.Name: (Optional) Secondary Start Date
Properties.Help:
Second start date for when you have a event that may happen twice a week/month etc. 
Format YYYY-MM-DD ie 2022-03-25

Properties.Name: X increment for Type
Properties.Help: The number here would mean every x days/weeks/months dependent on Reminder type eg 3 would mean every '3' days

Properties.Name: Display Text
Properties.Help: The text to be displayed, {days} will be replaced with total days left

Properties.Name: Day offset
Properties.Help:
Offset to add/remove from day.
Useful for if you wish to have "today" be the day before the actual day
(by specifying -1)

Properties.Name: Hour offset
Properties.Help:
Offset to add/remove hours.
Useful for if you wish to have the 'new day' start at 3am by entering '3' also accepts minus values

Properties.Name: Custom Icon URL when day is "Today"
Properties.Help:
Overrides current icon with whatever icon is specified by url here.
This will only apply when the date is "Today"

Properties.Name: Custom Icon URL when day is NOT "Today"
Properties.Help:
Overrides current icon with whatever icon is specified by url here.
This will only apply when the date is NOT "Today"
